org.springframework.data.redis.connection

类 RedisStandaloneConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.redis.connection.RedisStandaloneConfiguration

  • public class RedisStandaloneConfiguration
extends Object
    Configuration class used for setting up RedisConnection via RedisConnectionFactory using connecting to a single node Redis installation.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      RedisStandaloneConfiguration()
      Create a new default RedisStandaloneConfiguration.
      RedisStandaloneConfiguration(String hostName)
      Create a new RedisStandaloneConfiguration given hostName.
      RedisStandaloneConfiguration(String hostName, int port)
      Create a new RedisStandaloneConfiguration given hostName and port.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • RedisStandaloneConfiguration

        public RedisStandaloneConfiguration()
        Create a new default RedisStandaloneConfiguration.

      • RedisStandaloneConfiguration

        public RedisStandaloneConfiguration(String hostName)
        Create a new RedisStandaloneConfiguration given hostName.
        参数:
        hostName - must not be null or empty.

      • RedisStandaloneConfiguration

        public RedisStandaloneConfiguration(String hostName,
                                    int port)
        Create a new RedisStandaloneConfiguration given hostName and port.
        参数:
        hostName - must not be null or empty.
        port - a valid TCP port (1-65535).

    • 方法详细资料

      • getHostName

        public String getHostName()
        返回:
        the hostname or ip of the Redis node.

      • getPort

        public int getPort()
        返回:
        the port or the Redis node.

      • setHostName

        public void setHostName(String hostName)
        参数:
        hostName - the hostname or ip of the Redis node.

      • setPort

        public void setPort(int port)
        参数:
        port - the Redis node port to connect to.

      • getDatabase

        public int getDatabase()
        返回:
        the db index.

      • setDatabase

        public void setDatabase(int index)
        Sets the index of the database used by this connection factory. Default is 0.
        参数:
        index - database index.

      • getPassword

        public RedisPassword getPassword()
        返回:
        never null.

      • setPassword

        public void setPassword(RedisPassword password)
        参数:
        password - must not be null.
